sponsor: Pfizer's Upjohn has merged with Mylan to form Viatris Inc.
briefTitle: A Long-Term Study To Evaluate Safety And Efficacy Of Pregabalin For Pain Associated With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy
officialTitle: An Open-Label Extension Safety And Efficacy Study Of Pregabalin (CI-1008) For Pain Associated With Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of the long-term use of pregabalin at doses up to 600 mg/day in patients with painful diabetic peripheral neuropathy who have completed 13 weeks of dosing in Study A0081163
